item.description:
Former photojournalist, Scot Langdon, will discuss his personal experiences working in the news business by incorporating examples of his own work, including a picture story shot while living on Kibbutz Malkiya in northern Israel. He will include discussions on picture-sequencing, story-telling with images and lighting difficult situations in the field.

FYI:  Main Street Art is located at 75 Main Street, Newfields, NH.  If you are interested in purchasing a brown bag lunch from the Newfields Country Store (just down the street from MSA), call 603-773-5656 by 11:15 a.m. and your lunch will be ready for pick-up on your way to the Art Talk.
item.name: Art Talk at Main Street Art in Newfields: Photojournalism
